Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: The secret of success in life is for a person to be ready for opportunity when it comes.

Author: Denis Watley
Quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable.

Author: Douglas H. Everett
Quote: There are some people who live in a dream world, and there are some who face reality; and then there are those who turn one into the other.

Author: Unknown
Quote: The secret of happiness is the realization that life is a gift, not a right.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: When you're nice to people, they want to be nice back to you.

Author: Edward Everett Hale
Quote: If you have accomplished all that you have planned for yourself, you have not planned enough.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: Judge each day not by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.

Author: German Proverb
Quote: Who begins too much accomplishes little.
